item.title: Catalyst Network: The first step towards Decentralized Internet
item.description: What is decentralized internet? Why we need the decentralized Internet? I know these questions are obvious once you read the title. First, understand the current situation of the internet and then we’ll explore the possibilities of the Catalyst Network. What is the current situation of the Internet? A global network connecting millions of computers is the Internet. The Internet is decentralized by design. But today’s situation is far from this. The tech giants like Amazon, Google, Microsoft and Facebook dominating the internet.
